mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Little, John N.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Little, John N. Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Flesh wound of neck by a comrade while on duty. Location Wounded: Cumberland, MD. Date Wounded: 1865/04/18. Nature of Wound: Bayonette [Bayonet]. Result: Transferred to Ward K and on furlough.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Little, John N.
Flesh wound of neck by a comrade while on duty
